description: Build a simple, elegant personal website for a data scientist + founder, inspired by Andrej Karpathy's design

tasks.title: Initialize Next.js Project Foundation
tasks.description: Set up Next.js 14 project with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, ESLint, and proper project structure
deliverables: Next.js project initialized with App Router

tasks.title: Create Layout Components and Typography System
tasks.description: Build reusable layout components and establish typography system with Inter font
deliverables: Main layout component with proper HTML structure
Color palette implementation in Tailwind config
acceptance_criteria: Layout is responsive across all screen sizes
Typography hierarchy is clear and consistent

tasks.title: Build Header Section with Photo and Social Links
tasks.description: Create the header section with professional photo, name, title, and social media links
deliverables: Header component with profile photo placeholder
acceptance_criteria: Social links are properly aligned and functional
Photo placeholder is properly sized and positioned
Header is responsive on mobile devices

tasks.title: Implement About Section
tasks.description: Create a concise about section with professional background and current focus
deliverables: Content structure for background and interests
acceptance_criteria: Section has proper spacing from header

tasks.title: Create Timeline Section (Karpathy-style)
tasks.description: Build the chronological timeline with year markers on left and content on right
deliverables: Timeline item component for individual entries
acceptance_criteria: Timeline is readable on mobile devices
Easy to add new timeline entries

tasks.title: Build Achievements Section with Project Cards
tasks.description: Create project cards layout for showcasing achievements, projects, and publications
acceptance_criteria: Cards have consistent design and spacing
Hover effects are smooth and subtle
Easy to add new project cards

tasks.title: Add Icons and Interactive Elements
tasks.description: Integrate Lucide React icons and implement smooth interactions throughout the site
acceptance_criteria: All icons are consistent in style and size
Hover effects are smooth and professional
Icons enhance usability without being distracting

tasks.title: Implement Responsive Design and Mobile Optimization
tasks.description: Ensure the website works perfectly on all device sizes with proper responsive behavior
acceptance_criteria: Site works flawlessly on mobile devices
Timeline and cards adapt properly to screen size
Text remains readable at all breakpoints
Navigation and interactions work on touch devices

tasks.title: Performance Optimization and SEO Setup
tasks.description: Optimize site performance, add SEO meta tags, and ensure fast loading times
deliverables: Meta tags and Open Graph implementation

tasks.title: Vercel Deployment Configuration and Final Testing
tasks.description: Configure the project for Vercel deployment and perform final testing across all features
acceptance_criteria: All features work in production environment
Custom domain can be easily configured
Site meets all performance and accessibility goals

notes.parallel_execution: Tasks 3, 4, 5, and 6 can be worked on in parallel after tasks 1 and 2 are complete
notes.content_preparation: Prepare your professional photo, bio content, timeline entries, and project information before starting task 3
notes.customization: Each task includes placeholder content that should be replaced with your actual information
